title: George Wallace, Aziz Ansari, Sarah Jessica Parker, Robert Klein and Jon Stewart
description: Jerry Seinfeld is joined by friends for a drive in a classic car and having coffee, sharing stories all along the way.

guests.name: Season 4 - Premiering June 19, Noon ET / 9AM PT

title: A Little Hyper-Aware
description: Jerry Seinfel and his special guest, Sarah Jessica Parker, sip a Starbucks while driving a 1976 Ford Country Station Wagon to Long Island's Colony Diner...for another cup of coffee.

title: Two Polish Airline Pilots
description: Jerry Seinfel and long-time friend George Wallace laugh about the good old days as they cruise down the Vegas strip in a 1965 Buick Riviera and stop for coffee at the famous Peppermill Restaurant.

title: Episode Trailer
description: Jerry Seinfeld' next special guest is George Wallace (The George Wallace Show).

title: Opera Pimp
description: Jerry Seinfeld and his hero, Robert Klein, cruise around Westchester County, NY, in a '67 Jaguar Mark II to look for lunch and a hot brew and somehow wind up at Sing Sing prison.

title: Episode Trailer
description: Jerry Seinfeld' next special guest is iconic comedian Robert Klein.

title: Episode Trailer
description: Jerry Seinfeld' next special guest is Aziz Ansari (Parks and Recreation).

title: It's Like Pushing a Building Off a Cliff
Episode Trailer
description: Jerry Seinfeld' next special guest is Jon Stewart (The Daily Show)

title: Season 5 Premiering November 6th
description: Jerry Seinfeld is joined by friends for a drive in a classic car and having coffee, sharing stories all along the way. Season 5 premiers November 6th.

title: Seinfeld's Meeting With Crackle Prez Gets Tense
description: Jerry Seinfeld is urgently called in to the Crackle World Headquarters to speak with the President, Dick Corcoran.

guests.name: Season 5 - Coming Soon November 6, Noon ET / 9AM PT

title: You Look Amazing in the Wind
description: Description: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest Kevin Hart stylishly cruise around town in a 1959 Porsche RSK Spyder for their 'weird male date.'

title: I'm Wondering What It's Like To Date Me
description: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest Amy Schumer check out 'cute bongs' as they walk to a local diner for some coffee after their 1970 Ferrari Daytona breaks down.

title: Episode Trailer
description: Jerry Seinfeld' next special guest is Amy Schumer (Inside Amy Schumer).

title: Smoking Past The Band
description: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest Bill Burr cruise around L.A. in a 1970 Ford Mustang like a couple of bosses out on the town in the middle of the day.

title: Episode Trailer
description: Jerry Seinfeld' next special guest is Bill Burr (Date Night).

guests.name: Jerry's Next Guest is Bill Burr

title: Happy Thanksgiving Miranda
description: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest Miranda Sings cruise around town in search of coffee, complaining and apologizing along the way.

title: Episode Trailer
description: Jerry Seinfeld' next special guest is Miranda Sings (YouTube).

guests.name: Jerry's Next Guest is Miranda Sings

title: Episode Trailer
description: Jerry Seinfeld' next special guest is Fred Armisen (Saturday Night Live).

title: I Wasn't Told About This...With Special Feature: I'm Dying, Jerry
description: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest Fred Armisen cruise over to Portland's Coava in a 1965 Saab 96 Monte Carlo 850 for some coffee.

title: I'm Going To Take A Percocet And Let That One Go
description: Jerry and his waspy special guest Ali Wentworth go out for a spin in a low-grill 1970 Mercedes 280SE Cabriolet to grab some coffee.

title: Episode Trailer
description: Jerry Seinfeld' next special guest is Ali Wentworth (Office Space).

title: The Unsinkable Legend: Part 2
description: Jerry and his special guest Jimmy Fallon finish up their day on the water and head back to the mainland for John's Famous Pancake House and a cup of coffee.

title: Episode Trailer
description: Jerry Seinfeld' next special guest is Jimmy Fallon (The Tonight Show).

title: The Unsinkable Legend: Part 1
description: Jerry and his special guest Jimmy Fallon cruise over to Jerry's actual car in a 1956 Chevy Corvette convertible to hop aboard yet another vehicle to enjoy some comedic sailing out at sea.

title: Season 6 Premiering June 3
description: Jerry returns for Season 6, premiering June 3 at 11:30 ET. Riding along are: Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Jim Carrey, Steve Harvey, Stephen Colbert, Bill Maher and Trevor Noah.

title: I'll Go If I Don't Have To Talk
description: Jerry and the "James Bond of comedy" Julia Louis-Dreyfus reminisce as they share a cappuccino after cruising  the Pacific Palisades in a 1964 Aston martin DB5

title: Episode Trailer
description: Jerry Seinfeld' next special guest is Steve Harvey (The Steve Harvey Show).

title: Always Do The Banana Joke First
description: Jerry and Steve Harvey prowl Chicago in a '57 Chevy Bel Air convertible, enjoy some fine cigars and muse about offensive jokes and the futility of comedy class.

title: Episode Trailer
description: Jerry Seinfeld' next special guest is Jim Carrey (Dumb and Dumber).

title: We Love Breathing What You're Burning, Baby
description: Jerry's full of testosterone as he steps into a '76 Lamborghini Countach with Jim Carrey, who's between a three-week cleanse and a five-day silent retreat. After coffee, it's off to Carrey's studio to study a portrait of a gorilla with a machine gun. Wow.

title: The Comedy Team of Smug and Arrogant
description: Jerry chooses a 1979 VW Bug police car for good buddy Bill Maher because, as he says, Maher seems to have authority but actually has none. Case in point: when Maher talks politics, Jerry asks, "Boxers or briefs?"

title: Episode Trailer
description: Jerry Seinfeld' next special guest is Bill Maher (Real Time with Bill Maher).

title: That's the Whole Point of Apartheid, Jerry
description: Jerry takes incoming Daily Show host Trevor Noah on a tour down under the Brooklyn Bridge, where they riff on football (aka, soccer), apartheid's stupidity, and Noah's insane daily routine.

title: Episode Trailer
description: Jerry Seinfeld's next special guest is Trevor Noah, soon to be host of The Daily Show.

title: Episode Trailer
description: Jerry Seinfeld's next special guest is Stephen Colbert, soon to be host of The Late Show.

title: Cut Up And Bloody But Looking Good
description: Jerry rides shotgun with Stephen Colbert in a 1964 Morgan Plus 4, a British import that says you just don't care what people think. He's a late-night madman, according to Jerry, who's impressed with Colbert's beard and the manly way he pretends to smoke a pipe.
